name: Dress Up Animals
description:
Dress Up Buddies, is an educational game for Kids which let their imagination run wild by creating adorable and different combination of professions dresses.

With 5 different Pet Buddies (Lion, Bear, Panda, Hippo and Dino), you can create your very own Fireman, Santa Claus, School Boy, a beautiful bride/groom, Advocate, Astronaut, Chef, Cowboy, Doctor and many more.

To get started, tap your Pet buddy to add shirts, pants, shoes and place them on available 17 creative backgrounds. Don’t forget to take a snapshot of your creation and share them with your friends.

FEATURES

- Five adorable Pet buddies
- 14 Professions dresses with endless possibilities of changing them with each other.
- Choose from 7 categories with 14 item each
- Lots of Colorful backgrounds to choose from.
- Buddies make eye blink gestures
- Kids friendly interface
- Just lot of fun with soothing music
